summary: Gelato is the Italian word for ice cream. In English, it refers to a special type of ice cream from Italy. It has less fat than regular ice cream, around 6-9%, and more flavor. This makes it very creamy and flavorful. Gelato also has less air, which gives it a thick and rich texture. It's a popular treat that is known for its delicious taste and unique consistency.
title: Gelato
